mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop, feeling like I owned the place-because, let's be real, I practically do with the number of lattes I buy there. Anyway, I saunter up to the counter, ready to place my order, when lo and behold, the barista has the audacity to ask me to pay for my coffee! Can you imagine? Me, Hot Josh, a paying customer? I was so utterly flabbergasted that I threw my grande soy latte at the poor soul and stormed out, feeling completely justified in my entitled rage. After all, a man of my status should never have to open his wallet.
